org.kaaproject.kaa.common.avro

Class GenericAvroConverter<T extends org.apache.avro.generic.GenericContainer>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kaaproject.kaa.common.avro.GenericAvroConverter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the generic type that extends GenericContainer

    public class GenericAvroConverter<T extends org.apache.avro.generic.GenericContainer>
extends Object
    The Class AvroByteArrayConverter is used to convert {#link org.apache.avro.generic.GenericContainer specific avro records} to/from bytes. NOT Thread safe.
